title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4300.21 - Teller's records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4300.21 - Teller's records

State Regulations

On a daily basis each authorized pari-mutuel wagering
entity shall retain and account for each pari-mutuel teller all pari-mutuel
tickets or vouchers cashed, refunded or canceled and all draws and returns by
the teller. Each authorized pari-mutuel wagering entity shall then retain these
records at least three years after the end of the calendar year or until such
time as released by the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4300.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
